name: Events
description: Sets up content for events website.
author: Moov2 Ltd.

Settings.Description: People who are speaking at the event.
Information about the event (e.g. description, schedule, etc...)
Companies who are kindly sponsoring the event

Settings.Hint: Where the event is being held.
Link to location on Google Maps
Upload a hi-res image (ideally 2056x900), this will be cropped at various breakpoints to ensure an appropriately sized image is loaded to the device viewing the website.
Company the speaker works for an their role (e.g. Community Manager, Sega)
Couple of sentences about the news article.

Queries.Template:
select DocumentId
from ContentItemIndex 
where Published = true and ContentType = 'Event'
order by PublishedUtc desc
limit 1
Queries.Name: LatestEvent

Queries.Template:
select DocumentId
from ContentItemIndex 
where Published = true and ContentType = 'News'
order by PublishedUtc desc
limit 3
Queries.Name: RecentNews

HtmlBodyPart.Html:
